definitions.definition: Often of movements : very careful , cautious , or delicate .
Often of a person or the way they move : dainty , delicate; also, excessively delicate; affected , mincing .

main_definition: Often of movements : very careful , cautious , or delicate .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Often of a person or the way they move : dainty , delicate; also, excessively delicate; affected , mincing .
